programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi take a romantic trip to AlUla, where traditional Arab hospitality and the mysteries of an ancient kingdom beckon.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Off The Grid Zanskar, India
programme.desc: On reaching Zanskar, Alex visits Karsha Monastery, the largest one in Zanskar. She ends her stay after exploring the Sani Kanika Monastery, built in 17th century and the stupa.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Off The Grid Tsomoriri, India
programme.desc: Alexandra starts her journey from Tsomoriri where on the way she stops at Baralacha Pass. Later she visits Korzok village, interacts with locals and dresses up in a traditional Ladakhi attire.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and tries water sports.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: City breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 City breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Stories of king Timur’s reign and the Silk road lie in the mosaic-covered masterpieces of ancient Samarkand.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Despite the boom of the 21st century development, Tallinn, the 1000-year-old capital of Estonia, safeguards its UNESCO-listed medieval Old Town, one of Europe’s most complete walled cities. Marco Biagioli and Erica Melargo, a famous Italian nomad couple, lose themselves in its fairy-tale charms, and find out its legends. They also visit iconic attractions such as Alexander Nevsky Cathedral and Raeapteek, the oldest pharmacy in Europe that has continuously been in business in the same building.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Off The Grid Leh. India
programme.desc: Alexandra explores the rugged region of Leh, visiting Thiksey Monastery, Leh Palace and Shanti Stupa. Later she sets out for a five hour drive to the picturesque Pangong Lake and stays in the tent.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack, Brac and Split Croatia
programme.desc: Stay tuned with Alex to find out what Barc, the coastal town of Croatia, has to offer a backpacker. She tries quad biking.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 Xp Guide Cesky Krumlov
programme.desc: Český Krumlov Castle is one of the most important monuments in Central Europe in terms of architectural standard, cultural tradition and scale.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Off The Grid Nubra valley, India
programme.desc: A 106 feet Buddha statue mesmerizes Alex as she explores Diskit Monastery in Nubra Valley. She tries the traditional ladakhi food and explores Leh city, by visiting Gurdwara Pathar Sahib and a school.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Split and Salona, Croatia
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Xp Guide Amman, Jordan
programme.desc: Amman, the capital of Jordan sits on a wealth of seven hills, a monotonous sea of white cement structures with the occasional minarets and buildings.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle

programme.title: 2025 Gran Turismo
programme.desc: 2025 Gran Turismo

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: From Magdeburg, Germany.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Everything that has wheels takes part to see who is the fastest over the 402 meter concrete track in Eisenach, Thuringen Germany.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: BMW Tuner Manhart Racing celebrates at the Nurburgring Track.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: At the Nürburgring in Germany, with DTM legends Bernd Schneider and Ellen Lohr.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: 1964 marks Opel's foray into the upper class market and its attack on Mercedes-Benz. That year, Opel presented its KAD series with Kapitän, Admiral and Diplomat.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the BMW 507 Roadster.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type and the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A restored 300 SL prepares to race at the Mille Miglia classic car rally.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the Bayer K67, the first all plastic car in the world.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: The BMW X5M, Audi Q7, Mercedes GLS and Porsche Cayenne Turbo are among the strongest and fastest SUVs in the world; sports utility vehicles made in Germany are the embodiment of technical perfection, superior performance and unique comfort.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Packed with power, panache and charm, a diverse range of high-end SUVs from across the world shows how luxury comes in all sizes and shapes.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They represent the American lifestyle more than any other car: US SUVs and pickup trucks. They are extremely large, extremely powerful and extremely luxurious and they transport the feeling of unlimited possibilities and adventure.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape won't win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Ernest finds out if the BMW M135 does what it says on the tin; Foton aims to empower small business owners with the Truck Mate and Juliet gets reacquainted with the Citroën C3.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: Suggesting a smart upgrade from the Suzuki Swift; finding a bakkie fit for rubble removal, and is it financially wise to settle a car loan early?

programme.title: Sold in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: The South African Alfa Romeo GTV6 3.0 comes under the spotlight; one of the rarest BMW M3s goes under the hammer; the team revisits 1950s motoring in a Ford Thunderbird.

programme.title: Petrol Heads
programme.desc: Explore Germany vs. Japan, one of South Africa's top modified and tuner car events; featuring bold builds like a bagged Honda S2000, a '73 VW Beetle, an anime-inspired Subaru WRX and a high-tech Toyota GR86.

programme.title: The Yas Marina Story
programme.desc: The Yas Marina Circuit in Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Team X-Raid at the Dakar Rally
programme.desc: Stéphane Peterhansel is the most successful driver in the history of the Dakar Rally; with the German team X-Raid, he won the 2012 and 2013 editions of this prestigious competition in a Mini Countryman.

programme.title: Special - Pikes Peak
programme.desc: For almost a century man and machine have tried to tame the mountain that is Pikes Peak. Daredevils have risked everything to try and be fastest up the 20-kilometer road that summits the rocky mountain at 4300 meters above sea level.

programme.title: Ice Action Finland
programme.desc: Former World Rally Champion Armin Schwarz is a legend behind the wheels. Now he instructs others in driving a 300 hp Subaru WRX STI rally car on the snowy and icy landscape of Finland.

programme.title: Isle of Man TT 2015 Documentary
programme.desc: TT Sidecar champion Klaus Klaffenböck and racing expert Lenz Leberkern explore the fascination behind the Tourist Trophy on the British Isle of Man.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: An up-close look at how the Mercedes SL evolved from a racing car into a luxury sports vehicle.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang is one of the most successful sports cars in the world and has been an icon for over 50 years. It has amazed the world with its power, speed and amazing design.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: One of the biggest icons of the swinging sixties was the Mini. It was the perfect car of its time and often crowded streets of London.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: A car that everyone knows and that almost everyone has ridden in, a car that has conquered all continents and bears an unmistakable nickname, the Volkswagen Beetle.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: For Ferrari, the name alone raises the pulse; no other sports car has as much magic and myth as the fiery red icons from Maranello; whether on the road or on the race track, these cars are the center of attention.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Frank Slopianka is a racing junkie and constantly takes part in such events; US car fans Kati and Patrick join him for the Race 61, a rock and race festival in Finowfurt near Berlin.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Moritz loves vintage cars and has a dream of driving through the U.S. in his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5; before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX

programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 & 6 - Belgium

The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. It's the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jürjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Qarib Qarib Singlle
programme.desc: After reluctantly joining a dating app, a 35-year-old widow accompanies an easygoing poet on a trip to visit three of his ex-girlfriends.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E23 Jodha Akbar S4 E23
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Rocket Gang
programme.desc: A group of 5 friends, go to a resort called "Wonder-villa", at night while playing with a spirit board, they summon the ghosts of 5 children (the children had been with them the whole day, but they didn't know they were dead), the kids with their dance coach 'Tony' torture them, then make them dance and sing, the 5 friends escape, but one of them 'Amarbir' looks back and sees the sad faces of the children, afterwards he has a dream which makes him realize the a year ago he and his friends were driving on a hilly road, they were careless and were clicking selfies 'Amarbir' swerved the car but the bus with the 5 kids crashed and fell down the kill, killing them and their coach, the 5...

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Road Stars
programme.desc: The Silvretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the lightweight power packs Lotus Elise and Roding Roadster. Also: the elegant but still very powerful Porsche 911 Targa 4S.

programme.title: US Legends
programme.desc: This episode focuses on the 6th generation of two US classics, the Ford Mustang GT and the Chevrolet Corvette Z06, these iconic sports cars' history and development over the past decades.

programme.title: Motor Show Geneva
programme.desc: The elegance of an Aston Martin Vanquish met the brute force of a Lamborghini Veneno at the 2013 Geneva Motor Show. There is one thing that united all the super cars at this international event: exclusivity.

programme.title: Motor Show Geneva
programme.desc: The elegance of an Aston Martin Vanquish met the brute force of a Lamborghini Veneno at the 2013 Geneva Motor Show. There is one thing that united all the super cars at this international event: exclusivity.

programme.title: Open-top Top Dog
programme.desc: A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. In addition: a Brit with a fiery temperament, the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp. And: Mercedes AMG's SL models, uncompromising performance.

programme.title: Lexus GSF vs McLaren MP4-12C
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: The competition for the coolest souped-up cars in the Middle East continues. The prize is an overnight stay for two at the Sofitel Jumeirah Beach. This time, the spotlight is on a Lexus GSF, a Ford Mustang and a McLaren MP4-12C.

programme.title: Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: Episode 19
programme.desc: The roaring sounds of engines and exhausts usually dominate the Nuerburgring, but we focused on something a bit quieter this time. How about taking part in a 15 mile bike ride around the ring, or perhaps a 16 mile run?

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: French Classics
programme.desc: French manufacturers have also built milestones in automotive history in the past, including lesser-known brands such as Delage and Talbot, but also vehicles from Peugeot, Renault and Citroen.

programme.title: Turbo Diesel Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Audi's latest generation of TDI engines and their RS5 TDI Concept. In addition we compared the advantages and disadvantages of the two main fossil fuels for cars, gasoline and diesel. And: the 2014 Porsche Cayenne Diesel.

programme.title: The big journey
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG E63 S is a wolf in sheep's clothing. This station wagon has more power than the Nissan GTR 'Godzilla'. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS feels at home on the motorway and on the race track. And: Audi's powerful all-purpose executive car RS6.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Drift!
programme.desc: The Subaru BRZ provides a great feel for the road. In addition: the BMW 235i RS has a great rear wheel performance. And: the Porsche Cayman GTS is a car that makes you smile from the moment you step on the gas.

programme.title: Ferrari FF
programme.desc: The Ferrari Four, also called Ferrari FF, is the first four-wheel family car from Maranello. Also: the BMW M5 shines both as a family and business car. And: the Mercedes-Benz SL is a roadster drivers' dream.

programme.title: BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: Stunt world champion Chris Pfeiffer test drives the BMW F 800 R and explains why he is rather excited about the performance and handling of this robust and agile roadster. Also: a look behind the scenes of German helmet manufacturer Schuberth Helme's testing and development procedures. And: German actor Jürgen Vogel puts his new Ducati 1198 SP to the test at the Nürburgring.

programme.title: Harley Sportster 1972
programme.desc: Harley-Davidson add three additions to their model range of bikes: the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, the versatile Switchback Dyna, and the bad-boy ride „Softail Slim“. Also: two German bikers take a dusty adventure ride through Mexico on their BMW's. And: the Triumph Speedmaster, the British answer to Harley-Davidson's cruiser.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Plug and Drive Deluxe
programme.desc: In 2014, Mercedes-Benz presented their first Plug-in Hybrid, the S500. When it comes to Bentley, a V8 engine means down-sizing. We took a look at the brand's Flying Spur model with a smaller engine. And: the 6th generation Maserati Quattroporte.

programme.title: Tracktools
programme.desc: Do you want to feel like a racing driver without being limited to a race track? If so, the British manufacturer Radical is the right choice, as the company builds race cars with road approval. Their RXC is a powerful and agile racer.

programme.title: Mercedes-AMG G63
programme.desc: Racedriver Karim Al-Azhari presents his favorite car, a Ford GT. Also: a real monster on the road, the Mercedes-AMG G63. And: BMW's vision of open-top electric cars, the i8 Spyder concept car.

programme.title: The Ugliest Cars
programme.desc: The world of automobiles is also full of contrasts. There are fast and slow, beautiful and less beautiful models. We present our top 10 ugliest cars in the world.

programme.title: The Very Best Car Nicknames
programme.desc: Finding the right name for a car model often poses a challenge for the manufacturers' marketing departments. We take a look at our Top 10 of the best car names.

programme.title: BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: When Sports Meets Indulgence
programme.desc: Luxury class grand tourers with four doors. Porsche introduced their Panamera as a Plugin Hybrid or equipped with new turbo engines. BMW responded with their M6 Gran Coupe. German engineering at its finest.

programme.title: Hypercars
programme.desc: The Mc Laren MP4 12C, the Porsche 911 Turbo S and the Mercedes SLS AMG GT are super sports cars that are second to none. We put the pedal to the metal in these exciting and powerful driving machines.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Fire!
programme.desc: It's getting hot in this episode of Stunt Heroes. Stuntman Paul will be engulfed by flames as everything around him blows up in this dangerous fire stunt. The Action Concept team carefully prepares for this heated scene.

programme.title: Alarm in the gravel pit
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes turned a gravel quarry into their own stunt playground. This time, a motorbike without a driver flies over a ramp, a catapult for humans is tested and a new rollover punch is tried out in a fight scene.

programme.title: Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Batman's Dreams: Supercars in Acceleration
programme.desc: The clash of the convertibles, the Nissan 370 Z in comparison to Porsche's Boxster S. Also: the exclusive one-off high-performance sports car Maybach Exelero. And: a dream of a sports car, a vehicle of superlatives, the Bugatti Veyron Vitesse.

programme.title: Lifestyle SUVs
programme.desc: In Morocco, you can find the dream landscapes from 1001 nights. We took the Porsche Macan Turbo through the city of Marrakesh and its beautiful countryside. In addition: the BMW X 6M, one of the pioneers in the SUV coupe segment.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: French Classics
programme.desc: French manufacturers have also built milestones in automotive history in the past, including lesser-known brands such as Delage and Talbot, but also vehicles from Peugeot, Renault and Citroen.

programme.title: Turbo Diesel Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Audi's latest generation of TDI engines and their RS5 TDI Concept. In addition we compared the advantages and disadvantages of the two main fossil fuels for cars, gasoline and diesel. And: the 2014 Porsche Cayenne Diesel.

programme.title: The big journey
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG E63 S is a wolf in sheep's clothing. This station wagon has more power than the Nissan GTR 'Godzilla'. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS feels at home on the motorway and on the race track. And: Audi's powerful all-purpose executive car RS6.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Drift!
programme.desc: The Subaru BRZ provides a great feel for the road. In addition: the BMW 235i RS has a great rear wheel performance. And: the Porsche Cayman GTS is a car that makes you smile from the moment you step on the gas.

programme.title: Ferrari FF
programme.desc: The Ferrari Four, also called Ferrari FF, is the first four-wheel family car from Maranello. Also: the BMW M5 shines both as a family and business car. And: the Mercedes-Benz SL is a roadster drivers' dream.

programme.title: Techart Cayenne Turbo Magnum
programme.desc: Techart transforms the Porsche Cayenne Turbo into a real beast with more than 600 hp. Also: Nissan goes to the 24 hours of Le Mans with a car that looks like the Batmobile. And: BMW's 6 series Gran Coupe.

programme.title: BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: Stunt world champion Chris Pfeiffer test drives the BMW F 800 R and explains why he is rather excited about the performance and handling of this robust and agile roadster. Also: a look behind the scenes of German helmet manufacturer Schuberth Helme's testing and development procedures. And: German actor Jürgen Vogel puts his new Ducati 1198 SP to the test at the Nürburgring.

programme.title: Harley Sportster 1972
programme.desc: Harley-Davidson add three additions to their model range of bikes: the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, the versatile Switchback Dyna, and the bad-boy ride „Softail Slim“. Also: two German bikers take a dusty adventure ride through Mexico on their BMW's. And: the Triumph Speedmaster, the British answer to Harley-Davidson's cruiser.

programme.title: Episode 20
programme.desc: At the old-timer grand prix at the Nuerburgring you for example can see the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera RS
programme.desc: In the early 1970s the Porsche Carrera RS was the fastest and most agile production sports car in Germany. Today the RS is a Porsche classic with highest acclaim.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: Ready for Action
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of some of the exciting stunts at Action Concept, the biggest action movie production company in Europe. Also: Johannes and Ferdinand Stuck with the BMW Alpina D5 Twin Turbo at the test track. And: the Volkswagen Up city car.

programme.title: All New!
programme.desc: Following the Porsche 911's anniversary we take a look back at this iconic model's history. Also: the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with a diesel engine, the Volvo V60. And: safety measures in the car world, from seatbelts to crash tests.

programme.title: BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: When Sports Meets Indulgence
programme.desc: Luxury class grand tourers with four doors. Porsche introduced their Panamera as a Plugin Hybrid or equipped with new turbo engines. BMW responded with their M6 Gran Coupe. German engineering at its finest.

programme.title: Hypercars
programme.desc: The Mc Laren MP4 12C, the Porsche 911 Turbo S and the Mercedes SLS AMG GT are super sports cars that are second to none. We put the pedal to the metal in these exciting and powerful driving machines.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Fire!
programme.desc: It's getting hot in this episode of Stunt Heroes. Stuntman Paul will be engulfed by flames as everything around him blows up in this dangerous fire stunt. The Action Concept team carefully prepares for this heated scene.

programme.title: Alarm in the gravel pit
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes turned a gravel quarry into their own stunt playground. This time, a motorbike without a driver flies over a ramp, a catapult for humans is tested and a new rollover punch is tried out in a fight scene.

programme.title: Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Batman's Dreams: Supercars in Acceleration
programme.desc: The clash of the convertibles, the Nissan 370 Z in comparison to Porsche's Boxster S. Also: the exclusive one-off high-performance sports car Maybach Exelero. And: a dream of a sports car, a vehicle of superlatives, the Bugatti Veyron Vitesse.

programme.title: Sports SUVs
programme.desc: Three extraordinarily sporty SUVs are the Porsche Macan Turbo, the Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and the Audi RSQ3. Each of these is able to easily cope with each season of the year and, in regards to performance, could be mistaken for a sports car.

programme.title: Million-Dollar Toys from the Middle East
programme.desc: The McLaren MP4 12C Spider, one of many high-performance sports cars featured at the Doha Motor Show in Qatar. Also: the creations of manufacturers like Lamborghini, Bertone or Porsche but also the first Arab super sports car, the Lykan HyperSport.

programme.title: Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Women and their Classic Cars
programme.desc: A small group of car enthusiastic ladies offers resistance in the otherwise man dominated classic car world. One of them is Johanna. The 24-year-old loves her 1969 Corvette more than everything.

programme.title: Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Lightweight Cars
programme.desc: The BMW i8 was one of the first sports cars with some sort of a green image. In addition we took two fly-weight sports cars, the Lotus Elise and the Roding Roadster, to one of the most beautiful alpine pass roads.

programme.title: SUV Brothers
programme.desc: Three brothers from the same Volkswagen production platform: the Skoda Kodiaq provides room for seven people, the Volkswagen Tiguan is a bit more expensive but offers a broader range of engines, and Seat infuse the SUV segment with Spanish passion.

programme.title: Totally Jeep
programme.desc: In 2016, the readers of the German "Off Road" magazine once again awarded the Jeep Wrangler as their favourite 4x4. Also: at the "Meet'n'Jeep" Jeep enthusiasts drive their treasures through slush and mud. Also: test driving the Jeep Cherokee.

programme.title: Blacktrail E-Bike
programme.desc: The Blacktrail by PG Bikes is the fastest and lightest E-bike in the world, but also the most expensive. What's behind this exciting power package from Regensburg, Germany? Also: is BMW's new flagship bike, the K 1600 GT with 6 cylinders really worth its price and is it able to stand up to the competition by Honda, Kawasaki and Benelli?

programme.title: BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: Stunt world champion Chris Pfeiffer test drives the BMW F 800 R and explains why he is rather excited about the performance and handling of this robust and agile roadster. Also: a look behind the scenes of German helmet manufacturer Schuberth Helme's testing and development procedures. And: German actor Jürgen Vogel puts his new Ducati 1198 SP to the test at the Nürburgring.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Episode 13
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring shook when the VLN began its second leg of the tournament. We once again accompany you to this exciting competition, including the highlights of BMW's 1st leg win.

programme.title: Techart Cayenne Turbo Magnum
programme.desc: Techart transforms the Porsche Cayenne Turbo into a real beast with more than 600 hp. Also: Nissan goes to the 24 hours of Le Mans with a car that looks like the Batmobile. And: BMW's 6 series Gran Coupe.

programme.title: Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: On Patrol with the Dubai Police Supercars
programme.desc: The Dubai police's fleet of patrol cars includes a Chevrolet Camaro, a Lamborghini Aventador, a Bentley GT, a Ferrari FF and more. For the first time ever, their Special Cars Unit allowed a TV crew a glimpse behind the curtain.

programme.title: Offroad Minis
programme.desc: Small 4x4's are on the rise, as it doesn't need to be size that matters when it comes to having fun in the city or off-road. We take a look at mini SUVs, the Fiat's 500 X, the Cross Polo and Cross up! by Volkswagen and BMW's X1 XDrive.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour Australia
programme.desc: At the Land Rover Experience Tour Australia, 19 Land Rover Discovery Sport drive from the Northern Territory to the Gregory National Park and finally Ayers Rock. Burst tires and trapped cars are the order of the day, even complete breakdowns.

programme.title: Kelleners KS1 RS
programme.desc: The BMW One M Coupe from the former race-driver Ralf Kelleners: the KS1 RS is one of the highlights in 2012. Also: another big score from Porsche, the beautiful 911 cabriolet. And: the Bentley Continental GT V8 is a dream car.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour Australia
programme.desc: At the Land Rover Experience Tour Australia, 19 Land Rover Discovery Sport drive from the Northern Territory to the Gregory National Park and finally Ayers Rock. Burst tires and trapped cars are the order of the day, even complete breakdowns.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Classic Cars with All-Wheel Drive
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Type 166 amphibious vehicle is the all-rounder amongst off-road vehicles. Also: the Peugeot 205 Turbo 16 all-wheeler turned the World Rally Championship in the 1980s on its head. And : the Willys Jeep in our drive report.

programme.title: Rear-wheel drive for everyone
programme.desc: Cars with a rear-wheel drive are usually considered to be agile but also a bit capricious in regards to their handling. Does this also apply to the Porsche GT3 and the Smart? In addition: the sporty midsize sedan model range, BMW's 3 Series.

programme.title: Offroad for Everybody
programme.desc: Opel's Insignia Tourer Country was the German brand's first family car in outdoor attire. In addition: with the Capture Renault presented their first compact SUV. And: what happens when Fiat's cute compact 500 is inflated to the 500L Trekking?

programme.title: Luxury 2.0
programme.desc: Lexus was one of the pioneers when it comes to electric and hybrid cars. The brand's LS 600h, the BMW Active Hybrid 7 and the Porsche Panamera S E-Hybrid are prime examples of this mixture between combustion and electric propulsion.

programme.title: High Society
programme.desc: Rolls-Royce and Bentley are the ultimate upper class status symbols. Those who prefer a sportier approach can choose from a great range of brands like Bugatti, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche and McLaren that compete for the title of best sports car.

programme.title: BMW Z4 Zagato
programme.desc: The cooperation between BMW and Italian designer Zagato produced a real dream car, the Z4. Also: the energy efficient sports car Fisker Karma is a very rare breed. And: Jaguar plan to present their hybrid car C-X16 in 2013.

programme.title: The Fastest Cars in the World
programme.desc: Speed has always been one of the most important criteria when it comes to owning or driving a car. We show you our top 10 list of the fastest cars in the world.

programme.title: The Most Expensive Production Cars
programme.desc: Everyone knows that vehicles made by hand or in small numbers can be extremely expensive. But that can also be true for production vehicles. Here are our top 10 most expensive production cars.

programme.title: Special - Vampires
programme.desc: It's getting creepy at Stunt Heroes. During the filming of a horror movie, stuntwoman Anna turns into a vampire and is supposed to attack a mercenary in an action scene.

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: Bentley Continental GT3-R
programme.desc: Since its establishment in 1919, Bentley consistently drew attention thanks to their ongoing success in motor sports. The limited edition Continental GT3-R was one of the iconic manufacturer's sportiest cars ever.

programme.title: Porsche Cayman GTS
programme.desc: On the sunny island of Mallorca we made the Porsche Cayman GTS climb hills and take on a race track. In addition: the state-of-the-art Corvette C7 in a Wild West theme park. And: the Nissan 370 Z Nismo, an affordable sportscar with individual style.

programme.title: Automotive Legends of Recent Times
programme.desc: The history of car manufacturing goes back more than 100 years. We look at the top 10 highlights of recent automotive history.

programme.title: Cars with the Most Dangerous Brakes
programme.desc: When you are on the move, the first thing you should learn is how to brake. But not all carmakers have a good hand at it. We present the top 10 cars with the worst brakes.

programme.title: Blancpain Endurance Series 2013
programme.desc: The Blancpain Endurance Series is a racing event for grand tourers like the Ferrari 458 Italia, the McLaren MP4-12 C or the Nissan GT-R Nismo GT3. We took a look at all the action, the drivers, their cars at the 2013 competition.

programme.title: Special: 24h of Le Mans - Track Days
programme.desc: Two weeks before the start of the 24 hours of Le Mans, all teams are busy testing their cars on the traditional long distance track in France. Bad weather, accidents and a lot of tension, we documented the official test days in 2013.

programme.title: AC Schnitzer ACS5
programme.desc: Car tuner AC Schnitzer presents its ACS5 Sport model based on the BMW M5. Also: Audi's R8 models Coupe, Spyder and V10 Plus. And: a comparison between four super sports cars.

programme.title: Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.desc: These fails that span all generations of the family tree.

programme.desc: Sunscreen won't protect you from these summer fails.

programme.title: FailFactory
programme.desc: It's an unforgiving world out there. Let's stay inside and watch other people fail.

programme.title: FailFactory
programme.desc: An apple a day wasn't enough to keep the doctor away.

programme.title: FailFactory
programme.desc: You know what they say: beauty is pain.
